snippet: The police said the couple, Bruce and Deborah Leonard, beat their 19-year-old son Lucas to death in the Word of Life Church in New Hartford.
abstract: New Hartford, NY, police officials charge Bruce and Deborah Leonard with beating their 19-year-old son Lucas to death inside church; four other members of church are charged as well for their role in attack, which also left Leonards' 17-year-old son hospitalized in serious condition.

keywords.value: Word of Life Christian Church (New Hartford, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The police said the couple, Bruce and Deborah Leonard, beat their 19-year-old son Lucas to death in the Word of Life Church in New Hartford.

headline.print_headline: Parents Charged With Killing Their Son, 19, Inside a Church
headline.main: Parents Accused of Killing Son at Upstate New York Church
